name: Eagle Bancorp Montana, Inc.
description: Eagle Bancorp Montana, Inc. is a community-oriented financial institution that provides a full range of banking services to individuals and businesses throughout Montana. Founded in 1922 and headquartered in Great Falls, Montana, the company operates through its wholly-owned subsidiary, Eagle Bank. The bank offers traditional banking products such as checking and savings accounts, loans, and mortgages, while also providing specialized financial services tailored to meet the needs of the local community. With a strong emphasis on customer service, Eagle Bancorp Montana strives to build lasting relationships with its clients and supports local economic growth through various community initiatives. The bank is committed to leveraging technology to enhance customer experience, offering online and mobile banking solutions that provide convenient access to financial services. Eagle Bancorp Montana is focused on responsible banking practices, ensuring the financial well-being of its customers and contributing to the overall prosperity of the communities it serves.

seo.meta_title: Eagle Bancorp Montana, Inc. | Community Banking Services
seo.meta_description: Discover Eagle Bancorp Montana, Inc., a community-focused bank providing personal and business banking solutions in Montana. Explore our services and commitment to local growth.

faq.question: What services does Eagle Bank offer?
faq.answer: Eagle Bank offers personal and business banking services, including checking and savings accounts, loans, and mortgages.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Eagle Bancorp Montana?
faq.answer: M. Kevin Moser is the CEO of Eagle Bancorp Montana, Inc.

faq.question: Where is Eagle Bancorp Montana headquartered?
faq.answer: Eagle Bancorp Montana is headquartered in Great Falls, Montana, USA.

faq.question: When was Eagle Bancorp Montana founded?
faq.answer: Eagle Bancorp Montana was founded in 1922.
